name: Runemagic Series Adventure Two: The Wizard's Citadel
overview: The Character Generator program from the first adventure is required in order to play this adventure. A development of the first adventure in the series, you are challenged to loot the citadel of an unfriendly wizard. Allows you to load in the character you created in part one, or start afresh. It was developed by M Latto (coding) and A Crick (graphics) with artwork by A Lawes
